Name: Pontberry Martini
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: A light, fruity, easy drinking cocktail.
History: Adapted from a recipe created by Dick Bradsell in the late 90s for the opening of Agent Provocateur in Pont Street in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Pontberry Martini contains 174 calories
